summary: Standard boy-girl malt shoppe doings, with a free speech on campus sub-plot dropped in.
cast: Bobby Vee|Jackie DeShannon|Eddie Hodges|Suzie Kaye|Patsy Kelly|John Ireland|Mark Evans|Russ Conway|Jill Banner|Kim Carnes|Joy Tobin|Frank Alesia|Ken Osmond|Don Crawford|Tiger Joe Marsh|Ben Frommer|Ethel Smith|Bo Belinsky|The Pair Extraordinaire|Paul Gleason
title: C'mon, Let's Live a Little
